pages.text: The Harpy Feather allows its wearer to fly in a way similar to the Stone of the Sea's enhanced swimming. This comes at the cost of making flying straight very difficult and precise. The feather does $(bold)not$() grant flight on its own, the player must be a fairy or dragon (or gain flight through other means) to use this effect.$(br2)Item idea originally by Z-Tunic

This item has an additional ability when held in either hand. When right clicking, the holder will be able to jump a second time. This can be used to soften falls, and even works on mounts (though, not very useful on them).
